title: The Dom on the Naughty List
description: An MFF Bisexual RomanceWho needs Christmas when it brings bad memories? Jude is hung up on his past but his bisexual brats Q and Sabrina are going to drag their normally good-natured Dom into the festive season even if they have to put him on the naughty list. But being in a m√©nage a trois isn't simple.Family drama, unexpected consequences, and the sexy shenanigans all avalanche in with the snow to make Jude, Sabrina and Q find out exactly how deep their love goes.This is a standalone Christmas novella that is a sequel to the Happily Ever After story of The Dom with a Safeword.
author: Cari Silverwood
